item.description:
It's Bella's 1st Birthday and her mom has a gift for each pug attending to celebrate Bella's special day!

Welcome to our monthly Pug meet-up. Please be sure to RSVP accordingly for the meetups. If you initially respond 'yes', but are unable to make the meet-up, please change your RSVP to 'no' so another pug waiting can join in the fun! Thanks!
item.name: The Boston Pug March Meeting
